abstracts.cdata!:
The Industrial Recovery Project will
            improve the quality and broaden the scope of financial
            services to medium-sized and large private industrial
            companies. More specifically, it will: (i) introduce a
            repayment mechanism for long-term credit; (ii) promote
            development of the capital market; and (iii) develop
            corporate finance capabilities within Fondo de Equipamiento
            Industrial (FONEI) to offer comprehensive financial packages
            and related technical assistance. The project, itself, will
            provide: (i) finance for fixed investment and working
            capital, and, as a pilot program for the restructuring of
            overleveraged companies, equity and quasi-equity
            investments, and (ii) technical assistance to FONEI.
